name: Backroom Horror Game
description:
King Peng Studio present our first horror game in 3D

The game area is laid out as a “mazy” building with many doors and rooms (the doors are not yet implemented). It's also supposed to be horror-y, with weird mechanics and unnatural physics.

With this build we would like to test our maze design.

Timer starts when you pass the door.F ind the Green room and come back here.

After that, find the RED room and return again. When you're done, you will see your times. Feel free to run the maze multiple times (requires restart) and record your laps in the Google form

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfNGbbePvk95UvT_7t-e8GB-FPQekv-8I6Nosus...
